news.title: Silicon Valley's AI deals are creating zombie startups: 'You hollowed out the organization'
news.summary: Tech giants have spent billions to buy top talent from startups, leaving behind shell companies. Unable to make big AI purchases because of regulatory hurdles.

news.title: Bessent says interviews for 'incredible group' of potential Fed chairs will start after Labor Day
news.summary: Bessent confirmed the race to replace current Chair Jerome Powell is between 11 candidates. In a CNBC interview, Bessent said there are 11 candidates in the running to replace Powell.

news.title: Trump promised Ukraine 'security guarantees': Here's what they could look like
news.summary: Trump says security guarantees for Ukraine would be "provided" by European countries with "coordination" with the U.S. The talks are taking place in Washington, D.C.

news.title: Best Buy launches third-party marketplace as it looks for sales drivers
news.summary: Retailers are using third-party sellers to expand their assortment. The move helps drive higher profits and attract advertising dollars. It joins other retailers that have used the tactic to increase their sales.

news.title: Intel is getting a $2 billion investment from SoftBank
news.summary: SoftBank will pay $23 per share for Intel's common stock, acquiring roughly 2% of the struggling chipmaker. SoftBank will buy Intel for roughly $23 billion.

news.title: Gold has crushed stocks, bonds and even bitcoin in 2025. This banking giant just got more bullish.
news.summary: UBS Global Wealth Management strategists see plenty of drivers to keep pushing gold beyond the record run it has seen in 2025. UBS: Gold will hit $1,400 per ounce by 2025.

news.title: Viking Therapeutics’ stock tumbles after results of oral weight-loss drug trial. It has company.
news.summary: Viking Therapeutics announced that a trial showed its oral weight-loss drug works. Like a larger rival, its stock price immediately suffered.

news.title: European defense stocks in retreat. Ukraine peace could derail the rally.
news.summary: Prospect of peace may crimp demand in the sector that has rallied this year. Prospect of peace could crimp Demand in the Sector that has Rallyed this Year.

news.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
news.summary: “We have retired from full-time work,” says the couple. “We’re not going to do it anymore.” “It’s time to go home.’

news.title: Home Depot sees U.S. sales accelerate, suggesting home-improvement slump may be over
news.summary: Home Depot is seeing customers engaging more broadly in smaller home-improvement projects. Home Depot: We're seeing customers engage more broadly with small home- Improvement projects.
